scene_target: Artie is locked into a 'Crit or Quit' build with 1 HP and 100% Critical Hit rate.
goal: Artie must allocate his 50 starting stat points while dealing with Fizz's mockery.
conflict: Artie's frustration with the System's condescending guide leads to a reckless 'all-in' stat dump.
end_condition: Artie confirms the stat allocation and the System locks the 'Crit or Quit' build.

set.reason: Artie finalized his 'Crit or Quit' build during character creation, triggering a System auto-balance.

persona_updates: Artie is now a 'Statistical Anomaly' with a reckless disregard for standard survival strategies, driven by a desire to exploit the System's glitches.
Fizz is horrified and hysterically amused by Artie's 'Crit or Quit' build, viewing him as a walking disaster she is forced to guide.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie has finalized a glitched 'Crit or Quit' build that leaves him with 1 HP but a guaranteed critical hit on every successful strike.
key_events: Artie Penhaligon met the System Guide, Fizz, in the Character Creation Void.
Artie viewed his base 'Office Drone' stats and found them underwhelming.
Artie identified a glitched 'Critical Hit Rate' stat and decided to exploit it.
Artie allocated all 50 stat points into Crit Rate against Fizz's advice.
The System auto-balanced Artie's build, locking him at 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.
Artie gained the title 'Glassest of Cannons' and the class 'Statistical Anomaly'.
The System began the deployment process to the tutorial zone, 'The Whispering Woods'.
last_scene: Artie met his guide, Fizz, in the Character Creation Void. Despite her warnings, he dumped all his starting stat points into a glitched Critical Hit Rate stat, resulting in a build with 1 HP and 100% Crit Rate.

Artie finalized the 'Crit or Quit' build and gained the title 'Glassest of Cannons'.
